name: Charged
description:
Charged! An awesome puzzle game about Eletric Fields...

This game was done for the Second Vaultacular jam hosted by White Vault Studios. The theme for the jam was "A strange influence" with the limitation being "Only 3 items". 

The game consists in 14 levels where you have to make use of an eletric field to change the direction of the charge to reach the objective.
